website_summaries.verdict: With a steel frame and "metal tech" liner, this is a reliable choice in terms of stability.
pros: Comprehensive purchase includes pump, pool cover, ladder, and ground cover
Manufacturer offers other sizes as well
cons: Some owners were disappointed with the longevity of the included components, such as the filter

customer_reviews.title: Not a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: This pool is not good. I had this pool installed less than a year ago and all the support beams are rotted/rusted out. I seldom post reviews but this thing is garbage. Too bad because the pool liner is appears to be a good.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Stuebing

customer_reviews.title: Best “disposable” pool
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY LOVE THE POOL but my filter was cracked. Fortunately I had an old one to use as a backup.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: The beat pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool was super easy to set up, and it is the perfect size for a smaller back yard! It filled up pretty quick too! My kids have lived in it since I started filling it. I love the sturdyness of the legs, makes me feel safer over pvc pipes!
customer_reviews.author: debra curran

customer_reviews.title: Few more things needed....
customer_reviews.text: At this time, It is a nice small relaxing pool to replace my much larger above ground pool that we had for 15 years. They should sell the submersible vacuum with this pool or as a set piece instead of finding out later when the pool is up and you are trying to figure how to clean it. I use the hand skimmer quite a bit because I did not purchase a wall skimmer attachment...not sure if that is a good deal. Taking down and/or winterizing will be interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Jarel Miles

customer_reviews.title: BUMMER
customer_reviews.text: THE MECHANICS OF THE POOL ARE AWFUL.. THE PUMP WENT OUT THE SECOND WEEK I HAD IT. THEY DID SEND ME ANOTHER ONE, BUT TOOK A WEEK TO GET IT. I WISH I HAD GOTTEN AN INTEL.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY RUST

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This pool has exceeded our expectations—it was larger than we thought, was easy to set up (took maybe an hour), and has held up very well through our four kids’ daily swimming plus many pool parties! The pool filled up in 8 hours with 2 hoses, which was much faster than we thought it would take. The only thing we have been disappointed in is the suction power provided by the motor. It just isn’t strong enough to clean the bottom of the pool with our cleaning tools. :( (I’m fairly certain we put it all together correctly! We might try it again.) Overall, very happy with this pool!
customer_reviews.author: JAKingston

customer_reviews.title: Cover sucks!!!!!! Don’t bother sending the cover! Don’t buy for the bonus of the cover
customer_reviews.text: Pool is great so far. Set up was very easy, 1 hour and 20 minuets. However I agree with the other review on here the cover SUCKS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kids
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. We used it last summer and took it down for the winter but plan on using it again next summer. The pump could use extra power but if you run it 10 hrs a day you should be fine. The pool is a great size for our kids under 6
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pool is great. Seller needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The pool is great. We love it. False advertising on it coming with a ground cover. The description needs to be updated. Amazon needs to set up on this! There are numerous reviews here saying buyers didn’t get the ground cover. I’m one of them. Seller offers poor customer service response to this clearly known issue. If you buy it, be prepared to buy a ground cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Pool Review
customer_reviews.text: One thing about this pool the vacuum won't fit in the suction so we have to buy a different kind of fitting. Also tgere is another fitting that doesn't work properly but I guess not worth returning the pool in the whole scheme of things.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Broadie

customer_reviews.title: The Pump is for a baby pool
customer_reviews.text: Great pool was easy to install very sturdy. However the pump is insufficient. We had to add another pump from our old pool. They should give an option when buying to pay more for a better pump.
customer_reviews.author: sheree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pool
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this pool to keep the kids busy during the summer. We absolutely love it! The pool is big enough for our family of 4 plus more! Totally worth the money. Please note the ground must be leveled or it will slope. Also we purchased a sand filter based on some of the reviews, but so far it the filter that came with it works pretty good. The set up took about 3 hours with my husband and I, but it wasn’t too difficult. The ladder works well and we are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rforde

customer_reviews.title: Pump is to small to clean pool. To many ...
customer_reviews.text: Pump is to small to clean pool. To many oulets to get proper flow within pool. Orafice for hoses are NOT UNIVERSAL, all requier adapters to use universal above ground pool hoses. Only had pool set up less than 60 days and pump failed. Bought proper size pump 4 pool. Still trying to get original pump replaced, said it was under waranty but cust serv stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: We got sold a good pool and a broken pump , we tried to use warranty but of course they have none instock. So had to spend alot out of pocket....
customer_reviews.author: sarah giron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it. We hooked up a salt water system to it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love this pool
customer_reviews.text: We bought best way to replace our intex. Very nice pool. It's actually more sturdy than our intex was. Pump is very strong. Pushes the water back into the pool great. I like that we can add chlorine tabs to the water return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good if you get a new ladder
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to set up. Came with everything I needed. The instructions for the pump kind of sucked but we got it together anyways. The only reason I gave four stars is because the ladder was shaky and it makes me nervous.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Wood

customer_reviews.title: Buy a more powerful pump
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this pool and got great use out of it. The only thing is you need to invest in a stronger pump.. we bought a much more powerful sand pump. Other than that this is a great investment
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. That’s about it Filter system way to small for size pool. Ladder was so flimsy we were scared to use it, went out and bought a new ladder of better material. Cover, not worth the struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry D.

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The pool itself is nice but the pump is not big enough for the size of the pool. I think they should have another option with the pool to order a larger pump or if the pump stops working. I got this pool in "August and already having issues with the pump not wanting to come on. Can't seem to find a contact email or phone number to get the pump replaced. Anyone have any info on how to contact the seller?
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wills

customer_reviews.title: DELIVERED WITHIN 48 HOURS
customer_reviews.text: I HAVEN'T OPENED THE PACKAGE BUT I WANTED TO QUICKLY WRITE THIS REVIEW. IT WAS FREE DELIVERY, NO EXPEDITED CHARGES. SO I WAS NOT EXPECTING THIS POOL FOR 1-2 MORE WEEKS. INSTEAD IT ARRIVED WITHIN 48 HOURS! I'M AMAZED, MY KIDS ARE EXCITED. DURING THIS PANDEMIC THERE HAVE BEEN DELAYS AND CANCELLATIONS EVERYWHERE SO IT IS A RELIEF TO HAVE SOMETHING GO BETTER THAN EXPECTED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need better instructions for assembly/better product pump doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: We had to figure out installation instructions ourselves. Called customer service @ Amazon & she was not not very helpful. So kudos for us the pool is set up & working. Now, barely two month having the pool the pump goes out. So now I'm waiting for a 30% discount. All I wanted is to stay cool this summer. We can't even buy a pump at 30% discount.
customer_reviews.author: Ester

customer_reviews.title: Set up
customer_reviews.text: Box says 30 min set up. No. 2 people took 2 hours. Not difficult but really needed more people. Have to have one holding up frame till the other gets enough pieces together to stand on its own. 3 people would’ve been so much easier. YouTube how to change filters after filled. No instructions were included! There were few instructions for anything. None for upkeep
customer_reviews.author: Christene Keith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The seal around the main discharge valve leaks bad-has only been up for 4 days. Quality control is below standards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pool.. we did upgrade the pump like everyone suggests.. first time pool owner and it is a little scary but worth the fun.. especially during this pandemic..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pool for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool! I'm glad we tried the hard sides type. Went up and came down simple. Pool kept very clean. My husband and I used it so there was no grass or sand getting in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny. Great quality pool and a great purchase. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase this summer. Especially being quarantined. The pool completely exceeded my expectations. It really looks like a regular above ground pool. Perfect size, easier set up, and great quality. My only complaint is the ladder. Could be bigger all around. But not a major deal. Oh and so far the filter although small is working just fine and doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Love our pool
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool. Not too hard to set up, the ladder was the hardest to put together. Nice size!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal
customer_reviews.text: Great pool and even better pool for the price. I do recommend purchasing a cordless pool cleaner/vacuum as the filter is not super strong. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective pump
customer_reviews.text: My husband spent all day putting the pool together . When he went to start the pump, it was cracked and leaking all over. We haven’t heard back from bestway yet
customer_reviews.author: Rjd

customer_reviews.title: Pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Pool itself was easy to set up. This review is for the pool cover. I recommend not even opening the cover and placing it right in the trash. Its 100% garbage and is poorly designed. There needs to be clips on the side of the pool or something to mechanically attach the cover. The draw string is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey P.

customer_reviews.title: Summer pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool. We have not put it together yet. Comes with stuff you need except chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it kids are super happy and they love there new pool.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Prentiss and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good pool for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good pool for a low dollar item. The only thing I don't like is that the filter holder leaks a little around the top, but not enough to hurt anything. We have it hooked up with a chlorine generator (salt water) and our water is crystal clear all the time. Almost no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: Pool is filling now. I only Wish the pump had a timer like my previous one. Also there is no on/off switch.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Paxman

customer_reviews.title: Power Steel
customer_reviews.text: Where is the steel, the pool does not look like it will last long. Could not send back this pool was ordered for a special little boy for his birthday. The pool will be taken care of so we will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy pool. I expect it to last for several years
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were pretty confusing but once I figured out it went together pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: oneoldsailor!

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun !
customer_reviews.text: Love the pool . Assembly took some doing !!! The small pump really did not clean the pool . We had a larger pump from a previous pool . Keeps it sparkling clean . Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: The pump needs an upgrade at some point, doesn’t pull the water hard enough to filter probably.
customer_reviews.author: Anair Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Great pool, well made. I didn't use the pump provided. But over all a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Adward Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it so do we
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the filter as we knew we would. But everything else is 100 percent perfect
customer_reviews.author: jose garcia

customer_reviews.title: Where stuff is
customer_reviews.text: So upset something is missing Pool cover and filter pump , filter are missing .. unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and price is great
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pool we have purchased and we would recommend this one to anybody. Very easy to set up and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump not big enough for this pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool. Nice size. The pump is worthless. We’ve had this pool for a few months now and have since had to purchase a bigger more efficient sand filter pump
customer_reviews.author: SwampLife

customer_reviews.title: Broken pump/ no ground cover
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with ground cover, pump is broken/leaking.. It is a nice pool but unfortunately it did not come with everything. We set this pool up last night and the pump is already leaking up underneath near where the screws are.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: The filter for this pool sucks. It is not strong enough for the amount of water this pool holds however the pool itself is awesome! It is the first large pool we’ve purchased and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ami B.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The pump is way to little and leaks very bad.ladder was bent so its not sturdy at all .and I paid way to much.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pump was Junk. broke within a month of purchasing the pool
customer_reviews.author: ashley k.

customer_reviews.title: Is there a warranty on the filter/pump?
customer_reviews.text: The filter/pump has already died, how can I get a new one?
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kleven

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was every bit what we expected it to be and so we are very happy. The seller got this to us in a very timely manner and we actually received it a few days earlier than what we anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Michele V.

customer_reviews.title: Pool
customer_reviews.text: Very good pool nice and easy to assemble good quality
customer_reviews.author: Karly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my family of 5
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was on time. It wasn't too hard to assemble. It is bigger than I imagined it. My kids and husband would live in it if they could lol
customer_reviews.author: Chamorra

customer_reviews.title: Splashing around!
customer_reviews.text: It did take some effort to put up our pool but once we did, it’s been lots of fun! My sone is thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive pool and easy to put up, but the pump is way too small!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble .
customer_reviews.text: Delivered what was advertised. Works well for us . Sturdy and easy to assemble .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake
customer_reviews.text: Mid represented how easy it was to put up it is not for widows
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble but it doesn’t have a lot sturdiness but everything else is great and it’s also great for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Pritom Barua

customer_reviews.title: Bad pump
customer_reviews.text: Great pool but the pump did not work, waiting to hear from seller for fix or replacement .
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: It’s not good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to put together I wish I could return it
customer_reviews.author: Mousa

customer_reviews.title: Great way to stay cool this summer money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up fairly priced not a strong pump tho...
customer_reviews.author: Alysiaetheridge

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s been goid
customer_reviews.text: Pool is good so far, needs a better pump for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pearsall-Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: The pool is great and very good quality. It is bigger than it looks. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dante4602

customer_reviews.title: That it is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Used for my 2 grandsons.....very easy to build..anyone can do this..just by looking at the pictures...excellent.
customer_reviews.author: edward m.

customer_reviews.title: Easy seat up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and take down truly enjoyed looking forward to next year
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend pool and seller. I ordered pool Thursday night and my order was delivered Saturday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cool down on a hot summer day!
customer_reviews.text: Pool was delivered quickly by seller; it arrived before scheduled time. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: DIEGO CORTES

customer_reviews.title: Needs a stronger filter pump
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a stronger pump to get it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best temporary pool we have had so far! Perfect size and so easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Would've given 5 stars if the instructions were easier to find
customer_reviews.author: srvr4life

customer_reviews.title: I like the pool but the cover that comes with it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the pool but the cover that comes with it won't stay on it keeps slipping into the water. We have tightened the strings as tight as we dare without ripping it.
customer_reviews.author: Warm toes.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pool! We upgraded to a sand filter with a timer!
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My pump did not even work when I started it up the first time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will love this pool
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I decided on this pool....upgraded from Intex 30 in with the pvc frame....The steel frame is very strong....very easy to install...was delivered on the time....we love it...I also bought an Intex skimmer...which works fantastic with the pump that came with the pool...the ladder is sturdy enough for the kids but has no landing on top so is a little awkward for adults
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sure we will enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put it up yet. Bought it for next summer. Sure we will enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Power Steel 16' x 48" Frame Pool Set
product_meta.description: Size:16' x 48"The Bestway 16ft Power Steel Pro Frame Pool is perfect for cooling down and chilling out during scorching summer months. The pool's tough PVC and polyester outer wall and 'metal tech' liner are held in place by durable steel frames, which are fitted together using 'T' connectors and 'C' clips. The connectors, clips and frames have been specially designed for easy connection so that setting up this above ground pool is as easy, quick and convenient as possible. Thick PVC flaps are used to cover the 'T' connectors and 'C' clips to prevent rust. Also included are a 48in ladder to climb in and out the water, 1500gal filter pump to help keep water clear, clean and pristine, a protective ground cloth and a tough cover to keep out debris.
feature_bullets: Extra strength side walls are made with advanced TriTech material with 3 separate layers
Reinforced rope wraps around the bottom of the pool liner to keep the legs firmly in position
Flow control drain valve for easy draining
Includes 1,000gal Filter Pump, Ground Cloth, Ladder and Pool Cover

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars199 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
